comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Elliott Cowdin, Norman Prince, William Thaw were among the American aviators who were part of the Lafayette Escadrille, an all-American squadron for the French air service: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lafayette_Escadrille Thaw: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/William_Thaw_%28aviator%29 Prince (died 1916): en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Norman_Prince

comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: Elliott C. Cowdin: ralph.smith.angelfire.com/Flying_Corps/Pilots/ElliottCowd... They returned on December 23, 1915 on the Holland-America liner Rotterdam for an eight days' leave (according to New-York tribune., December 24, 1915, Page 2, with similar photo).

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks to all of you for your great research.  We'll straighten out the names in the caption and add some of the information to the record the next time we update.
